data.text: Arranged in order of time of occurrence.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Relating to or in accordance with chronology.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Relating to chronology; containing an account of events in the order of time; according to the order of time: as, a chronological table or narrative; a chronological arrangement of works of art.
In order of <xref>time</xref> from the <xref>earliest</xref> to the <xref>latest</xref>
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.
from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: relating to or arranged according to temporal order
data.attributionText: from WordNet 3.0 Copyright 2006 by Princeton University. All rights reserved.
